description: I. Letter dated 27/01/2010 from Andrew Hind (Chief Executive, Charity Commission) to David Bell (Permanent Secretary, DCSF) regarding clause 42 of the Children, Schools and Families Bill, which would make academies charities. 1 p. II. Letter dated 28/01/2010 from David Bell (Permanent Secretary, DCSF) to Vernon Coaker MP regarding clause 42 of the Children, Schools and Families Bill. 2 p. III. Letter dated 02/02/2010 from Vernon Coaker MP to David Amess and Janet Anderson (Chairs of the Children, Schools and Families Public Bill Committee regarding clause 42 of the Children, Schools and Families Bill. 1 p.
department: Department for Children, Schools and Families
